comment: Ive read some of the narrative on the vaccines published by Dr Marty Makary of Johns Hopkins. He says all research shows them to be safe and highly effective in both preventing you from getting COVID19, and from transmitting it. I have had both shots of the Pfizer.
amr:
# ::snt Ive read some of the narrative on the vaccines published by Dr Marty Makary of Johns Hopkins. He says all research shows them to be safe and highly effective in both preventing you from getting COVID19, and from transmitting it. I have had both shots of the Pfizer.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (r / read-01
            :ARG0 (ii / i)
            :ARG1 (n / narrate-01
                  :ARG1 (v / vaccine
                        :quant (s / some)
                        :ARG1-of (p / publish-01
                              :ARG0 (d / doctor
                                    :name (n2 / name
                                          :op1 "Marty"
                                          :op2 "Makary")
                                    :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                                          :ARG1 (f / facility
                                                :name (n3 / name
                                                      :op1 "Johns"
                                                      :op2 "Hopkins"))
                                          :ARG2 (p2 / practitioner
                                                :mod (p3 / pediatrics)))))))
            :snt2 (s2 / say-01
                  :ARG0 (h2 / he)
                  :ARG1 (s3 / show-01
                        :ARG0 (r2 / research-01
                              :mod (a / all))
                        :ARG1 (a2 / and
                              :op1 (s4 / safe-01
                                    :ARG1 v)
                              :op2 (e / effective-04
                                    :ARG0 v
                                    :ARG1 (a3 / and
                                          :op1 (p4 / prevent-01
                                                :ARG0 v
                                                :ARG1 (g / get-01
                                                      :ARG0 (y / you)
                                                      :ARG1 (d2 / disease
                                                            :name (n4 / name
                                                                  :op1 "COVID19")))
                                                :op2 (t / transmit-01
                                                      :ARG0 y
                                                      :ARG1 d2)))
                                    :degree (h3 / high-02)))))
            :snt3 (h4 / have-03
                  :ARG0 (ii2 / i)
                  :ARG1 (s5 / shoot-01
                        :ARG1 (p5 / product
                              :name (n5 / name
                                    :op1 "Pfizer"))
                        :mod (b / both)))))

# ::snt It's a synthetic drug injection
(ii / inject-01
      :ARG1 (d / drug
            :mod (s / synthetic))
      :domain (ii2 / it))

comment: Absolutely Pumping chemicals into your body
amr:

(p / pump-01
      :ARG0 (y / you)

      :mod (a / absolute))
